display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (NREM): (Apneas with >= 4% oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with >= 4% oxygen desaturation used and with or without arousal) / hours of NREM sleep from type I polysomnography
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-rapid eye movement sleep associated with >= 4% desaturation) / (hours of non-rapid eye movement sleep (NREM))]
calculation: 60*(hnrbp4 + hnrop4 + canbp4 + canop4 + oanbp4 + oanop4 + manrbp4 + manrop4) / (slpprdp - minremp)
